scripts.ci: yarn workspaces run build && yarn workspaces run lint && yarn workspaces run type-check:test && yarn workspaces run test
scripts.deploy: yarn workspace pandora-common run build && yarn workspace pandora-server-directory run build && yarn workspace pandora-server-shard run build && yarn run deploy-client
scripts.deploy-client: yarn workspace pandora-client-web run build && rsync -rltOvcP --delete-delay ./pandora-client-web/dist/ ../pandora-client-web/dist
scripts.parallel:build: yarn workspace pandora-common run build && { yarn workspace pandora-server-directory run build & yarn workspace pandora-server-shard run build & yarn workspace pandora-client-web run build; }
scripts.parallel:lint: yarn workspace pandora-common run lint & yarn workspace pandora-server-directory run lint & yarn workspace pandora-server-shard run lint & yarn workspace pandora-client-web run lint;
scripts.parallel:type-check:test: yarn workspace pandora-common run type-check:test & yarn workspace pandora-server-directory run type-check:test & yarn workspace pandora-server-shard run type-check:test & yarn workspace pandora-client-web run type-check:test;
scripts.parallel:test: yarn workspace pandora-common run test & yarn workspace pandora-server-directory run test & yarn workspace pandora-server-shard run test & yarn workspace pandora-client-web run test;
scripts.parallel:ci: yarn parallel:build && yarn run parallel:lint && yarn run parallel:type-check:test && yarn run parallel:test
